name: Always Higher
description: Always Higher is a single-player sci-fi adventure shooter VR game. Play as a secret agent, collect data modules, avoid enemy soldiers and escape underground facility!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX970 / AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX980 / AMD equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Recommended room space is at least 3 x 2 meters
